title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 171-1.6 - Searches
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 171-1.6 - Searches

State Regulations

Whenever possible, a student's physical presence must be
obtained to search his or her room, locker, and/or possessions. Whenever it is
impossible to obtain the physical presence of the student, the facility shall
notify him or her in writing as soon as possible thereafter: (a) that a search has been made; and
(b) of any article
taken. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
171-1.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
